## Biography

Navya is an undergraduate studying Biological Sciences with a minor in Childhood Studies. She enjoys working with children, which guided her choice of major and minor, as well as her future career goals. Post-graduation, she hopes to attend medical school and become a pediatrician. Outside of academics, Navya enjoys going to the beach, watching the sunset, and watching rom-coms.
